A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Wow\, amazing amount of hate for this movie. I love that the criticism of TFA was that it was too similar to ANH. Well now Johnson goes and diverges considerably from the formula and fan go crazy that it's too different. The fact that this movie's fan rating is currently lower than Batman vs. Superman is all the evidence I need to disregard half the ratings here. Johnson took a lot of chances and I loved it.
